dc_title_s: Abandoned Mine Land Inventory Sites: Pennsylvania, 2018
dc_description_s: This data set portrays the approximate location of Abandoned Mine Land Problem Areas containing public health, safety, and public welfare problems created by past coal mining. It is a subset of data contained in the Office of Surface Mining (OSM) Abandoned Mine Land Inventory. This layer represents the AML Inventory Sites, which are the boundary of an entire problem area. All related AML point/polygon features must fit within the boundary of the designated problem
